Agreed, it is the best camera to get. =C2=A0There are several models avail=
able: some have built in IR lights, some have IR / UV lights, some are set-=
up for sky watching, and others are just plain ol' full spectrum. 


With t=
his camera (depending on the model, a regular one with the different option=
s run around $120-150), you will also need the power supply ($12-$20), a tr=
ipod, and a portable recorder. =C2=A0My group uses 2 of them and each one i=
s attached to a portable DVD recorder that has a small LCD screen, you can =
find these refurbished for under $100.


Tim
